org.red5.server.net.remoting.message

Class RemotingPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.red5.server.net.remoting.message.RemotingPacket

  • public class RemotingPacket
extends Object
    Packet of remote calls. Used by RemoteProtocolDecoder.
